channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: skypilot-org /skypilot
item.description: SkyPilot: Run AI and batch jobs on any infra (Kubernetes or 16+ clouds). Get unified execution, cost savings, and high GPU availability via a simple interface.

item.title: RVC-Boss /GPT-SoVITS
item.description: 1 min voice data can also be used to train a good TTS model! (few shot voice cloning)

item.title: langgenius /dify
item.description: Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.

item.title: khoj-ai /khoj
item.description: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

item.title: getzep /graphiti
item.description: Build Real-Time Knowledge Graphs for AI Agents

item.title: fastrepl /hyprnote
item.description: AI Notepad for back-to-back meetings. Local-first & Extensible.

item.title: microsoft /generative-ai-for-beginners
item.description: 21 Lessons, Get Started Building with Generative AI üîóhttps://microsoft.github.io/generative-ai-for-beginners/

item.title: AmruthPillai /Reactive-Resume
item.description: A one-of-a-kind resume builder that keeps your privacy in mind. Completely secure, customizable, portable, open-source and free forever. Try it out today!

item.title: trimstray /the-book-of-secret-knowledge
item.description: A collection of inspiring lists, manuals, cheatsheets, blogs, hacks, one-liners, cli/web tools and more.
